head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COYLE, MICHAEL P., SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COYLE, MICHAEL P., SR.

block.p: COYLE-Michael P., Sr. Of Hackensack on August 18, 2000. Beloved husband of Ruth A. (nee McGinness). Devoted father of Dr. Michael P., Jr., Brian J. Esq., Dr. Kevin T., Dr. Dennis G., Terence S. and Mary K. Coyle. Also survived by 14 grandchildren and one great-granddaughter. Funeral Liturgy Tuesday, 10 AM, at Holy Trinity R.C. Church, Hackensack. Entombment St. Joseph's Cemetery, Hackensack. Visiting Monday 2-4 and 7-9 PM, at Volk-Leber Funeral Home, Teaneck, NJ (201-836-0202).
